Title: Congregation
Writer: Ty Franck (based on the novels by), Daniel Abraham (based on the novels by), Mark Fergus (developed by), Hawk Ostby (developed by), Daniel Abraham, Ty Franck, Hallie Lambert (staff writer)
Actors: Steven Strait, Cas Anvar, Dominique Tipper, Wes Chatham
Plot: Wounded survivors arrive at the Behemoth. Holden and Ashford have a conversation. Holden tries to come to grips with what he has seen and tries to find out what is going on with the Station.
